writeAsHtml(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Method in class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread
This method writes out an HTML page with the small images alined next to each other Each Group and picture is created in an html file called jpo_1234.htm except for the first one that gets named index.htm. 1234 is the internal hashCode of the node so that we can translate parents and children to each other.

writes the collection.dtd file to the target directory.

writeJpg(File, RenderedImage, float) - Static method in class jpo.ScalablePicture
This static method writes the indicated renderedImage (BufferedImage) to the indicated file.
writeLog - Static variable in class jpo.Settings

writeValues() - Method in class jpo.SettingsDialog
after the save button is clicked this method is invoked which reads the values off the GUI fields and writes them to the Settings object.
